name: Two Lines
description:
This game was created in one week for the Scream City game jam.

You assume the role of a man in an ominous city, seemingly alone. Though your surroundings seem familiar, you are not sure why, and you must explore the town in search of an answer. 

This game is difficult. If you can complete it, please try to solve the riddle from the opening sequence in a post below. There is also an "easter egg" that some die hard survival horror fans will likely notice.
